description: Complete system for understanding sleep stages and achieving the deepest state of conscious relaxation through Yoga Nidra

stage_5.state: Body reposes restfully while consciousness expands

preparation.goal: Reach NREM state without entering sleep cycle

step_1.action: Savasana preparation and initial breath work
step_1.details: Head North, establish Savitri breathing pattern

step_2.details: Visualize point of pin, create bindu for dharana (concentration)

step_3.details: Circle spiral into: top of thimble → rim of tea cup → rim of saucer → dinner plate → rib cage and basin of pelvis → mid-chest and pubis → lower neck and mid thighs → eyebrows and ankles → top of head and bottom of feet → 6 inches above and below body

step_4.details: Moving beyond individual identity to vastness of universe

step_5.details: Spiral back to the little point, akin to securing screw into wood, reestablishing individuality

step_7.details: Enjoy cosmic state of relaxation, roll over on left side, lift left arm, come to all fours, slowly stand

step_8.details: Wiggle little finger of right hand to ensure complete return

psychological: Breaks samskaras and vasana patterns that contribute to limited individuality
Aligns Pancha Koshas (five layers of being)

22_part_body_relaxation.name: Chetna Nidra
22_part_body_relaxation.description: More detailed body awareness technique for enhanced consciousness development

scientific_understanding.cellular_level_optimization: When we work on physical exercise, the exchange of gases happens at cellular/tissue level. Tissues need oxygen and glucose for optimal function. With exercise, CO2 builds up. Pranayama enhances lung efficacy - most people use only 10% of lung capacity. Increasing to 20% gives 100% improvement in oxygen delivery.
scientific_understanding.acid_alkaline_balance: Muscles produce acid when tired, putting body in survival mode. Pranayama enhances system capacity for optimum endurance.
scientific_understanding.kumbhaka_effects: Breath retention techniques slow down the system, making it more efficient overall.

practical_tips.positioning: Head facing North for optimal energy alignment
practical_tips.timing: Best practiced in quiet environment without disturbances
practical_tips.progression: Start with shorter sessions, gradually extend duration

contraindications: Severe mental health conditions without supervision
Inability to maintain awareness during deep relaxation
Extreme fatigue that leads to falling asleep rather than conscious relaxation
